FuncDef: This command creates a tunnel interface associated with an RSVP P2MP LSP. IPv4 multicast packets are forwarded over the P2MP LSP at the ingress LER based on a static join configuration of the multicast group against the tunnel interface associated with the originating P2MP LSP. At the egress LER, packets of a multicast group are received from the P2MP LSP via a static assignment of the specific <S,G> to the tunnel interface associated with a terminating LSP.
CLIs: no tunnel-interface { rsvp-p2mp <lsp-name> | ldp-p2mp <p2mp-id> sender <sender-address> [ root-node ] }

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the LSP. The LSP name can be up to 32 characters long and must be unique.
Identifier used for signaling MLDP P2MP LSP. Values-1 to 4294967296 (on leaf node).
Specifies the sender IP address: a.b.c.d.
